section_overview: Contextual activities and highlights near Wellington International that matter during this hub’s date range. Curated for competitive hunter/jumper riders and their families.
section_cta_text: Mix in a little downtime between classes — here’s what’s happening nearby this season.

leisure.overview: Casual downtime options between classes or on rest days.

highlights.title: Equestrian Trails
highlights.description: Miles of public bridle paths and greenways, best for morning hacks or a quiet afternoon ride.
highlights.timing: Best in cooler mornings before classes.

highlights.title: Palm Beach Beaches
highlights.description: Drive east ~25 minutes for a quick beach break on off-days.
highlights.timing: Plan early or late to avoid traffic.

culture.overview: Seasonal cultural and arts highlights during the hub dates.

highlights.title: Palm Beach International Polo
highlights.description: Sunday polo matches in season, a spectator tradition during WEF.

highlights.title: Norton Museum of Art
highlights.description: Modern and contemporary collections, easy day trip.

family_active.overview: Kid-friendly and family-oriented activities during WEF season.

highlights.title: Lion Country Safari
highlights.description: Drive-through safari park with over 1,000 animals; fun rest-day outing.

highlights.title: South Florida Science Center
highlights.description: Hands-on science and aquarium exhibits ~20 min from venue.

attractions.overview: Broader local draws tied to the hub season.

highlights.title: Clematis Street, West Palm Beach
highlights.description: Restaurants and nightlife popular with riders and owners after classes.

highlights.title: Worth Avenue
highlights.description: Palm Beach shopping and dining district, known for equestrian season gatherings.
